meaningMnemonic: I am <kanji>reliant</kanji> on you and I <kanji>trust</kanji> you. Therefore, I have a <vocabulary>request</vocabulary> for you that I'd like to <vocabulary>entrust</vocabulary> you with.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
